desc: Home One (Mon Calamari cruiser) made its theatrical appearance in Return of the Jedi as Admiral Ackbar's flagship during the Battle of Endor.
Imperial landing craft (or Sentinel-class landing craft) were designed for the Special Edition release of Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope and created entirely with CGI.
Imperial Shuttle. Lambda-class T4a shuttles first appeared in Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi, and were later added to the Special Edition release of The Empire Strikes Back.
The Star Destroyers are the Galactic Empire's assault ships. The Ravager, an Executor-class Star Dreadnought, was destroyed during the Battle of Jakku.
The Millennium Falcon is a highly modified YT-1300F light freighter captained by smuggler Han Solo and his Wookiee first mate, Chewbacca.
